name: git-hex-branch-cleanup-from-review
description: Turn code-review feedback into fixup commits and an autosquash rebase using git-hex tools

repoPath.description: Absolute path to the target git repository (required when multiple roots are configured)

onto.description: Base ref to rebase onto (e.g., main)

count.description: How many commits from HEAD to include when planning

subject.description: Short description of the cleanup goal (e.g., "address review comments and produce clean history")

details.description: Optional context: review notes, constraints, commit/grouping preferences, etc.
